deshapalana buddhiyak menma janatha sithum pathum awabodha karagatha haki pudgalayan janatha niyojithayan lesa thora pathkara gannayi thaman janathawagen illa sitina bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye mada kolambaa sama sanwidhayaka, aayojana prawardhana niyojya amathi fayisar musthapa mahatha pawasiya.ese nomathiwa mathiwarana kalayanhidi pamanak pamina buriyani, saruwath di chandaya illannanta hasu nowennayi hethema illa sitiyeya.basnahira palath sabha mathiwaranayata eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayen kolambaa disthrikkayata tharanga wadina em. ech. em mansil mahathage pracharaka katayathu aarambha karamin grandpashi sthapitha kala mathiwarana karyalaya pereda (8) wiwrutha kirime awasthawata ekwemin niyojya amathiwaraya ese prakasha kaleya.eksath jathika pakshaya siya balaya samadama mada kolambain thahawuru karagaththada eheth kisi dinaka ehi janathawage aarthikaya diyunu kirimata ho yatithala pahasukam diyunu kirimata katayuthu nokala bawa hethema kiweya.ee hethuwen aduma pahasukam sahitha merata ekama aasanaya bawata mada kolambaa pathwa athi bawa pawasu ee mahatha ema thaththwayen mada kolambaa galawa ganimata wathman rajayata katayuthu karaddi eetada eksath jathika pakshaya erehi hakul helamin sitina bawa kiya sitiyeya.eheth mada kolambaa janathawata gaurawaniya jiwithayak gatha kirimata awashya pahasukam labadimata gatha haki sama kriyamargayak ganna bawath ee sandaha mada kolambaa janathawage shakthiya eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayata basnahira palath sabha mathiwaranaye di labadimata katayuthu karana lesath musthapa mahatha pawasiya.awasthawadi deshapalanayaka yedena eksath jathika pakshaye ho wipakshaye pirista thawa duratath mada kolambaa chanda madhyasthanayak bawata pamanak pathkara ganimata ida nodena lesath ese wunahoth jiwitha kalayema pasu thawi thawi innata siduwana bawath niyojya amathiwaraya prakasha kaleya.fayisar musthapa mahatha meseda kiya sitiyeya.api hamotama janatha niyojithayek lesa pathwenna bari nisayi eeta wadathma sudusu kena pathkarala yawanne.

rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaya saha saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha athara eeye (6) sawasa pawathi sakachchawakin pasu ada (07) dina pawathwimata niyamithawa thibu waidya wada warjanaya sathiyakin kal damimata ema sangamaya thiranaya kara atha.malabe paudgalika waidya widyalaye waidya upadhi patamalawan pawathwimata yama sambandhayen rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaye niladharin eeye saukhya amathiwaraya samanga kala sakachchawakadi karunu pahak mul karagena mema thiranaya gath bawa rajaye waidya niladharinge sangamaye lekam waidya chandika epitakaduwa mahatha nikuth kala niwedanayaka dakwe.ema karunu meseya.(1) upadhi pradana aayathanayak washayen kala gasat pathraya piligatha nohaki bawa,(2) saukhya amathyanshaya pancha pudgala kamituwak path kara malabe aayathanaya pilibanda warthawak nikuth kirima,(3) malabe aayathanayata sisun bandawa ganima athhituwiya yuthu bawa danum dima,(4) waidya adhyapanaye pramithiya pilibanda thaththwayan nithigatha kirima,(5) saukhya lekamwaraya madhya sakachchawak kandawa karunu anawaranaya kirima..
